title: Huawei Watch_What is the distance for Bluetooth connectionï¼Ÿ
answer: In an ideal (less interference) environments, the distance of Bluetooth transmission is about 10m. Bluetooth transmission will be influenced by outside interference, such as an object barrier, a complex environment Wi-Fi, microwave, multi-Bluetooth environment will affect Bluetooth distance and stability, which is related to the Bluetooth protocol itself.
faqType: User Requirements, Complaints, and Public Opinions
